actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for automatic cost-of-living adjustments in the income tax and withholding rates.
short_title: Anti-Inflation Tax Reduction and Reform Act

summary.text: Anti-Inflation Tax Reduction and Reform Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide cost-of-living adjustments for the individual income tax rates and withholding tables.

titles.title: Anti-Inflation Tax Reduction and Reform Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for automatic cost-of-living adjustments in the income tax and withholding rates.
